network

Class Server.ClientThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • network.Server.ClientThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    Server

    public class Server.ClientThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread that is created for each client that connects, this deals with any updates from the clients, as well as writes updates to the client when the server requires it to.
    Author:
    Matt Byers

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientThread

        public ClientThread(java.net.Socket socket)
        Creates a new ClientThread with a connection to the Client Socket, reads the username from the client. Creates a new player with the username and adds the player to the GameState. Updates the GUI of all players to display the new player
        Parameters:
        socket - - The Client Socket.

    • Method Detail

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer(java.lang.String movingUser)
        Creates a NetworkEvent telling the client to move the specified player on their local gameState.
        Parameters:
        movingUser - - The player to move.

      • animationCycle

        public void animationCycle(java.lang.String cycleUser)
        Creates and writes a NetworkEvent telling the client to cycle the animations of the specified player.
        Parameters:
        cycleUser - - The user who is animating currently.

      • displayContainer

        public void displayContainer(Container c)
        Creates and writes NetworkEvent with as container, telling this client to display the given container.
        Parameters:
        c - - The container to be displayed.

      • run

        public void run()
        Continuously trys to read objects from the client, and if one is read the correct action on the server will be taken. Added to a queue if it needs to be processed or displayed etc.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • updateGUI

        public void updateGUI()
        Creates and writes NetworkEvent with a Player object correspondent to this client, telling the client to update their local copy with the new version.

      • updateInvent

        public void updateInvent()
        Creates and writes NetworkEvent with a Player object correspondent to this client, telling the client to update their local copy with the new version, and re-populate the inventory panel.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String message,
                        java.lang.String senderUser)
        Creates and writes NetworkEvent with a message and a sender, telling the cleint to display a message in the chat box.
        Parameters:
        message - - The message to be displayed.
        senderUser - - The user who sent the message, or Server.

      • getUser

        public java.lang.String getUser()

      • close

        public void close()
        Finish the main loop. Remove this player from the main game state. close the input and output to the client. Close the socket. UpdateGUI of remaining client so they know someone has left.
